name: Pitch Void
description:
Pitch Void is a randomly generated 2D top-down shooter inspired by games like Hotline Miami, Enter the Gungeon, The Binding of Isaac and other games we love.

This is our very first game. It was made by my brother and I to familiarize ourselves with Unity and game development, but mostly to make and finish a fun project together.

We'd love to hear what you think!

Code, Game Design and Environment Art was made by Luis de la Vega Lopez (me).

Character Art and Animations were made by my brother, Ricardo de la Vega Lopez.

Theme music: Temples - Private Ark by Six Umbrellas

Other sounds and art by: LukeSharples, Revon, JustInvoke [1] [2] and https://www.fesliyanstudios.com

Controls:

MOUSE to aim and shoot

WASD to move

SPACE to dash

HOLD R to reset

Release date: 05/31/2020
